messages.content: Hello! How can I assist you today?

为了帮助您查询美光（Micron）的相关信息，我可以访问网页来获取最新的内容。您具体想了解美光的哪些方面呢？例如公司新闻、产品信息、股票信息等。如果不确定，我将从他们的官方网站开始获取基本信息。

接下来，我将导航到美光科技的官方网站。

我已经成功导航到美光科技的官方网站。现在，您可以告诉我需要进一步采取什么行动，比如查找特定的产品信息、新闻更新等。如果您没有具体的要求，我可以截取当前页面的屏幕截图，或者获取页面上的文本内容供您查看。

需要我进行截图或提取页面文本吗？请指示下一步操作。

content.text:

"menu
MENU
search
LOW-POWER MEMORY

Powering mobile AI: World’s first 1γ LPDDR5X

Micron 1γ (1-gamma) LPDDR5X is revolutionizing AI-powered smartphones by delivering top speed grades and power savings in the industry’s thinnest package. It is purpose-built for next-generation smartphones, ensuring seamless AI experiences. 

VISIT 1-GAMMA LPDDR5X
pause

DRAM

How DRAM is changing the world

For over 57 years, DRAM technology has transformed how we live and work. Micron leads in DRAM innovation, enhancing performance and power efficiency from cloud to edge for data-hungry applications like AI. Celebrate National DRAM Day on June 4!

CELEBRATE DRAM WITH US

MOBILE

Motorola Razr 60 Ultra with Micron solutions
Visit mobile solutions​

AI​

Unlocking AI’s potential with storage IOPS
Read the blog

AUTOMOTIVE

ISO 21434 Cybersecurity Certification
Read the blog

DATA CENTER

Transform AI data centers with modular memory
Learn about SOCAMM

TECHNOLOGY

Next-gen 1γ (1-gamma) memory process node
Learn about 1γ

DATA CENTER SSD

World's first 60TB Gen5 SSD
Learn about 6550 ION SSD
 SEE MORE 

MARKET AND INDUSTRIES

Accelerating mobile technology

Discover how Micron is transforming the mobile industry with cutting-edge memory and storage solutions. Through industry-leading performance and efficiency, Micron’s memory and storage accelerate AI-driven technologies that enable predictive, insightful and new experiences for smartphone end users. Explore our advancements in mobile memory and storage to stay ahead in AI mobile technology.

VISIT MOBILE SOLUTIONS
Innovation makes new solutions possible

Data center

Choose the right data center memory and storage solutions and get control over the essential systems affecting your business.

Learn more

Client PC

Micron’s flexible memory and storage powers PCs from thin and light notebooks that last all day on a single battery charge to powerful data-hungry workstations.

Learn more

Automotive

For more than 30 years and trillions of miles, Micron has been committed to bringing high-performance memory and storage technology to the automotive industry.

Learn more

Mobile

Mobile memory and storage accelerate AI-driven technologies that enable predictive, insightful and new experiences for end users.

Learn more

MARKET AND INDUSTRIES

AI data centers. Unboxed. Unlimited.

Boxes are boring. They couldn’t possibly be beautiful, right? But, not all boxes are created equal. What if boxes could be a super-intelligent AI problem solver, taking on some of the world's most difficult challenges? With Micron's AI memory and storage solutions, boxes are beautiful.

UNBOX NOW

messages.content:
以下是从美光科技官方网站获取的部分文本内容摘要：

- **低功耗内存**：美光的1γ (1-gamma) LPDDR5X 是革命性的移动AI技术，提供行业最薄封装中的顶级速度等级和节能效果。
- **DRAM 技术**：自 DRAM 技术诞生以来的57年中，它已经改变了我们的生活和工作方式。美光在 DRAM 创新方面处于领先地位，为从云端到边缘的数据饥饿型应用（如 AI）提升了性能和能效。
- **移动解决方案**：美光通过前沿的内存和存储解决方案，正在改变移动行业。其内存和存储加速了由 AI 驱动的技术，为智能手机终端用户提供预测性、洞察性和全新的体验。
- **数据中⼼**：美光的 AI 内存和存储解决方案将普通的盒子变成了超级智能的问题解决者，能够应对世界上一些最困难的挑战。
- **汽车领域**：美光致力于为汽车行业带来高性能的内存和存储技术，已有超过30年的历史。

如果您对某个特定部分感兴趣或需要更多信息，请告诉我！此外，如果需要，我可以截取网站的屏幕截图。您是否需要我执行此操作？

![](0d4196fb-e08c-4ce8-bbbe-a4a2060f1ac1.png)

这是美光科技官方网站的截图。从图中可以看到关于低功耗内存（LPDDR5X）的信息，以及 DRAM 技术如何改变世界等内容。

如果您需要进一步的信息或有其他具体需求，请随时告诉我！

launchOptions.description: PuppeteerJS LaunchOptions. Default null. If changed and not null, browser restarts. Example: { headless: true, args: ['--no-sandbox'] }

allowDangerous.description: Allow dangerous LaunchOptions that reduce security. When false, dangerous args like --no-sandbox will throw errors. Default false.
